verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] [V: called] [ARG1: Jason Seaman , the 7th grade science teacher who tackled the shooter to the ground during Friday 's shooting at Noblesville West Middle School] .

President Trump Saturday called Jason Seaman , [ARG0: the 7th grade science teacher] [R-ARG0: who] [V: tackled] [ARG1: the shooter] [ARGM-DIR: to the ground] [ARGM-TMP: during Friday 's shooting at Noblesville West Middle School] .
